title: Super Card System - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts
tags: Cheats   Fanfiction   Game Elements   Male Protagonist   Parody   Pirates   Reincarnated in Another World   Slow Romance   System Administrator   Weak to Strong
author: Dark Old Demon   黑乎乎的老妖
description: In a world where human and monsters relied on mystical fruits and their inner power to fight for dominance, a lost soul was thrown, given the powers from all the other worlds he’s known. But there was a catch; he had no control over what power he would get! With knowledge beyond that of most, he sails his path to the top of the one piece world!>
